title: Example: Set <html lang> correctly
body:
Set the correct `lang` attribute on the root HTML element to improve accessibility and SEO.

Acceptance criteria:
- `<html lang="en">` (or appropriate locale) present
- Passes basic a11y checks

Notes: Update all HTML entry points if multiple exist.

title: Example: Add <meta charset> early in <head>
body: Ensure `<meta charset="utf-8">` is the first metadata in <head> to avoid encoding issues.

title: Repeat button: match font color and behavior
body:
The Repeat button appears with a darker font color compared to other buttons. Align its text color and interaction states with the rest of the button set.

Scope:
- View: `beta/index.html` (controls column)
- Styles: verify classes for `.btn` and `.btn-secondary`

Acceptance criteria:
- Repeat button text color matches other buttons in default theme.
- Hover, focus, and disabled styles consistent with other control buttons.
- Keyboard + click behavior matches: "Repeat (R)" triggers the same action as clicking, no extra side effects.
- No regressions to i18n labels or tooltips.

Notes:
- If a custom style overrides `.btn-secondary`, adjust or add a specific rule for the Repeat button to inherit the same color tokens as `.btn` buttons.
